message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. This is a great deal for both of us, as you'll be getting it for less than its true value, and I'll still be able to make a good profit. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand you're on a tight budget, but $8,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,500. This is a fair price that allows us both to walk away happy. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $9,500, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,000. Can you consider this price?
